title.oldValue: Microsoft Viva: Manage Interests - Curate Interests for your tenant and tag content with interests
title.newValue: Microsoft Viva: Manage Interests - Curate Interest inventory for your tenant

description.oldValue:
Admins can curate interest inventory for their tenant
and tag content with the curated interests, enabling learners with personalized
experience to pursue learning with these interests.
description.newValue:
Admins can curate interest inventory for their tenant, enabling learners with personalized experience to pursue learning with these interests.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/viva/learning/interests
